```{r}
Accuracy = fread('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cszys888/BEGGER-DATA---Team-1/master/CloudFactory_DataSet_Accuracy_Prediction.tsv') 
A1=Accuracy %>%
  group_by(task_id)%>%
  summarise(mean(accuracy),sum(work_duration))
View(A1)
```

```{r}
plot(A1$`sum(work_duration)`,A1$`mean(accuracy)`)

```

```{r}
as.numeric(Accuracy$keypress_keytypeint)
for(x in Accuracy$keypress_keytypeint)
{
  if(is.na(x)==TRUE)
  keytypeint=0
}
View(Accuracy)
A2=Accuracy %>%
  group_by(task_id)%>%
  summarise(mean(accuracy),count(keypress_keytypeint==1)/count(keypress_keytypeint))
View(A2)
```
